ANU.name: Nicholas J. Car
expertise: Interorganisational Information Systems And Web Services
interest: Semantic WebLinked DataGraph data structuresSpatial dataMetrology Informatics Nicholas is most interested in the interation of tools and researgh in these areas: research leads to a requirement for new tools; new tools then lead on to opportunities for more research.Nicholas maintains sevaral Open Source data science tools, such as Python's RDFlib, that are used to further research.
ANU.biography: He is also a member of the following Australian government-based data committees/Working Groups:
project: How can representations of spatial data be best presented in web data structures for use over the Internet?
